channel.title: Frozen-x Beta, the ultimate balance between economy and customs
channel.description:
Welcome to Frozen-x!
We're a brand new server, which is currently in beta stage. It's almost daily being updated, and we would love to hear your feedback! Our goal is to have a balanced server, between economy and custom content.
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download/y8xqdh2nl4bq9j6/Client.zip Forums: http://frozenx.eu/smf/
Here are a few things, on what we're offering you:
602 items and gfxs. 100% Working Dicing system Customized home area Customized Skilling area. Working slayer tasks, with points and rewards. Crystal key chest with awesome loot. Donator zone with donator monsters located in a second world and, exclusive shops! Godwars dungeon. Minigames such as pest control, warriors guild and barrows! Active PVM and PVP including two PKP shops. Bosses such as: Corporal beast, Tormented demons, Barrel chest anchor and more. A huge amount of unique customs, which are modeled by the owner himself. A friendly community, and a mature staff team.
Media [spoiler] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/21c9saf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/148qhw6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/juwp6q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/3010qxf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/14xgmtv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/xpuhpt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/30sy69s.png[/img] [/spoiler]
There is much more so, join us today and see what we will become! We hope to see you In-game!
Frozen, Elsa, Wimstr

item.title: Frozen-x Beta, the ultimate balance between economy and customs
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

List of updates, by the owner.

Multiple bars smelting works.
Correct coal ore usage, with steel bars and higher.
Added shark and manta ray, fishing spot.
Fishing experience has been balanced.
Herbs are now buy able from the herb shop.
All potions made with herblore work correct.
Crafting Experience has been balanced.
Firemaking Experience has been balanced, on log type.
Fletching Experience has been balanced, on log type.
Slayer Experience has been increased, due to low rate.
More rewards are added to the slayer reward shop.
Prayer Experience has been increased, due to low rate.
Butterfly net for hunter, is added to the general store.

In progress:

Voting with reward claim.
Correct working moneypouch.
Items kept on death.
Duel arena.
Mage arena minigame reward shop, points costs.

Read full topic
item.source: Frozen-x Beta, the ultimate balance between economy and customs

item.title: Frozen-x Beta, the ultimate balance between economy and customs
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

[quote=“5oulreaper, post:5, topic:541457”][quote author=naseem142 link=topic=660327.msg4415218#msg4415218 date=1395583248]

What’s so amazing? Why you don’t keep the original map/chat sprite

We felt like modifying the client and sprites.
So it fits the name of our server, which is a frozen theme.
You can also change the gameframe, without having the edited sprites.
Although above 474, the edited sprites will show up.

Well you could have at-least make it fit with the other sprites
[/quote]
its all doable :)[/quote]

This could indeed be done.
It’s still beta, and we’re happy about the feedback you guys gave about the sprites.

We will edit it, and see how it turns out.

Read full topic
item.source: Frozen-x Beta, the ultimate balance between economy and customs

@wimstr wrote:

Welcome to Frozen-x!

We’re a brand new server, which is currently in beta stage.
It’s almost daily being updated, and we would love to hear your feedback!
Our goal is to have a balanced server, between economy and custom content.

Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download/y8xqdh2nl4bq9j6/Client.zip

Godwars dungeon.
Minigames such as pest control, warriors guild and barrows!
Active PVM and PVP including two PKP shops.
Bosses such as: Corporal beast, Tormented demons, Barrel chest anchor and more.
A huge amount of unique customs, which are modeled by the owner himself.

There is much more so, join us today and see what we will become!
